com.advantech.bleeplib.utils

Interface BLEScanListener


  • public interface BLEScanListener
    BLEScanListener is a callback listener which will returns the scanning results after you register a listener using the following method.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Fabian Chung
    See Also:
    BLEUtil.addScanListener(BLEScanListener)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onLeScan(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device, int rssi, byte[] scanRecord)
      BLE scanning callback.
      void onScanStatusChanged(boolean isScanning)
      BLE scan status changed callback.

    • Method Detail

      • onLeScan

        void onLeScan(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device,
              int rssi,
              byte[] scanRecord)
        BLE scanning callback.
        Parameters:
        device - return a object BluetoothDevice
        rssi - rssi value
        scanRecord - scan record which includes the manufacturer data

      • onScanStatusChanged

        void onScanStatusChanged(boolean isScanning)
        BLE scan status changed callback.
        Parameters:
        isScanning - true Android device is scanning now; false otherwise
